meta.note: When enabled, reports will be send to recipients in the table: canteen_food_feedback_report_recipients
Using predefined labels users can communicate safely and you are still in controll of the communicated content
You can also provide a url to a custom platform

options.text: If you want a collection (e. G. wikis) to be translated do the following. Add a field type "translations" which will create a new collection (e. G. wikis_translations). In this collection add the following boolean (default: true) fields: "be_source_for_translations", "let_be_translated" and "create_translations_for_all_languages". Ensure that Directus automatically created a collection "languages".

meta.note: Informations about errors will be shown here.
Authentication - You need an authentication key to access to the API. https://www.deepl.com/de/account/summary

Optional: ID of the folder (otherwise we will create it)

options.text: Welcome to the auto backup extension. Please configure this setup. After that set the field ACTIVE to true
You can define the name of the backup file here. The name consist of the prefix, timestamp and postfix.
Please configure where your backup should be saved. You can either save it in the directus FileLibrary or define a custom path.

meta.note: A prefix for the filename of the backup.
Select how/where backups should be saved
A postfix for the filename of the backup.
The default timestamp format will be: YYYY-MM-DD-HH-mm-ss-SSS. Customize by using date-fns https://date-fns.org/v2.29.3/docs/format

options.text: Please tell us which database client you are using.

meta.note: If you want to run auto backups, just create a directus flow and change the field 'state' to the value 'check'

options.text: After this setup, you only need to active the next field ACTIVE

meta.note: Select the days that apply to the business hours.
These values are optional, but if provided, select a valid range for the business hours.
